text: Mme re tlaa reng fa re ikanya Keresete go re boloka mme re bo re iphitlhela re le molato, le gore ga re kake ra bolokwa kwa ntle ga go rupisiwa le go obamela melao e mengwe yotlhe ya Sejuta? A ga re na go tlhoka gore re re tumelo mo go Keresete e re ntshitse mo boammaruring e re koafaditse? Nnyaa, ga go a nna jalo, gonne Modimo ga o letlelele ope go nna pelokgale ka go akanya megopolo e e ntseng jalo kaga Morena wa rona.
